about-data.name: Alexandra Weaver
about-data.title: React Specialist. Developing code since 2009.
about-data.bio: I am a React specialist with a background in full-stack engineering who believes in the power of communication & collaborative problem solving. Since first touching code in 2009, I have worked with a range of different types of technology - from back-end, databases, APIs, front-end web, SaaS, SSO, desktop applications that talk to hardware via serial ports, game development, 3D modeling, augmented reality, mobile apps, Scrum, project management, & user interface/user experience design. My goal is to be able to make positive, meaningful contributions to the world with my technical skills.
